title: Emergency Remote Teaching-Based Nursing Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing knowledge and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Advanced nursing education course for pre-service teachers adapted to remote learning environments post-COVID-19, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Explain human diversity using genomic information
Apply practical nursing skills using remote education tools in emergency situations
Design and implement self-directed learning strategies in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
